definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Used to identify factors or pre-renal acute renal failure caused by oliguria.
sentences.chinese: 用於鑑別腎前性因素或急性腎功能衰竭引起的少尿。

sentences.english: The administration of radiocontrast media often leads to a reversible form of acute renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 造影劑應用後常可引起可逆性的急性腎功能損害。

sentences.english: It must be cautiously used for animals with renal dysfunction because of delay of sulfanilamide excretion.
sentences.chinese: 腎功能障礙時，磺胺藥排泄延緩，應慎用。

sentences.english: Conclusions The results indicated that carboplatin combined chemotherapy could induce disturbances of renal function.
sentences.chinese: 結論應用卡鉑聯合化療，可引起腎功能障礙。

sentences.english: Objective Using dual nuclide renal dynamic imaging to evaluate renal function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討雙核素腎動態顯像對腎功能的評價。

sentences.english: Xeloda is contraindicated in patients with severe renal impairment.
sentences.chinese: 希羅達禁用於嚴重腎功能不全患者。

sentences.english: Objective To explore ways and means of preventing and treating renal functional lesion caused by agkistrodon bite.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹蛇咬傷致腎功能損害的預防和治療方法。

sentences.english: The renal functions all returned to normal.
sentences.chinese: 伴腎功能不全者腎功能均恢復正常。

sentences.english: The renal functions all returned to normal.
sentences.chinese: 伴腎功能不全者腎功能均恢復正常。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical diagnosis meaning of nephrogram examination for the early renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腎圖檢查對早期腎功能衰竭的臨牀診斷意義。

sentences.english: It is indicated that this therapy has good effects on chronic renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 提示補腎活血法對治療慢性腎功能衰竭有良好療效。

sentences.english: It is also a leading cause of blindness, amputations, and loss of kidney function.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病也是失明，截肢及腎功能喪失的主要原因。

sentences.english: Blood can be cleaned by osmosis if the kidney has failed.
sentences.chinese: 若腎功能衰退，可通過滲透作用使血液淨化。

sentences.english: Do not increase dose if worsening renal function or hyperkalemia.
sentences.chinese: 如腎功能惡化或高鉀血癥不要增加劑量。

sentences.english: Clinical symptoms and renal of all patients have significant improvement after prostatectomy.
sentences.chinese: 行前列腺摘除術可有效改善臨牀症狀及腎功能。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of aristolochic acid on renal function and tissues morphology in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察馬兜鈴酸對大鼠腎功能和腎臟病理的影響。
